content.question: The author mentions “glass-blowing and harpsichord manufacture” (third sentence) to suggest that taxonomy is

choices.label: a field characterized by antiquated practices
an art that is extremely difficult to master
a profession practiced by relatively few people
an area of expertise with various practical applications

content.answer: a profession practiced by relatively few people

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Identify and explain claims and evidence within an argument.
